paper_abstract: We give a deterministic polynomial-time algorithm to check whether the Galois group Gal (f) of an input polynomial f (X) E Q[X] is nilpotent: the running time is polynomial in size (f). Also, we generalize the Landau-Miller solvability test to an algorithm that tests if Gal (f) is in Gamma(d): this algorithm runs in time polynomial in size W and n(d) and, moreover, if Gal (f) is an element of Gamma(d) it computes all the prime factors of #Gal (f).
paper_title: A polynomial time nilpotence test for galois groups and related results
